titleStmt.title: Lithobolia, or, The stone-throwing devil being an exact and true account (by way of journal) of the various actions of infernal spirits, or (devils incarnate) witches, or both, and the great disturbance and amazement they gave to George Waltons family, at a place call'd Great Island in the province of New-Hantshire in New-England ... / by R.C., Esq., who was a sojourner in the same family the whole time, and an ocular witness of these diabolick inventions ...
titleStmt.author: R. C. (Richard Chamberlayne)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed, and are to be sold by E. Whitlook ...,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to R. Chamberlaine. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.), BM.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
